1. Location Settings: Hogwart Travel's will need permission to access your device's location in order to provide you with travel information and to set alarms. 

 2. Notifications Settings: Hogwart Travel's will need permission to send you notifications about your upcoming trips, travel alerts, and other notifications related to travel. 

 3. Camera and Photos Settings: Hogwart Travel's will need permission to access your device's camera and photos in order to provide you with travel information and to set alarms. 

 4. Contacts Settings: Hogwart Travel's will need permission to access your device's contacts in order to provide you with travel information. 

 5. Audio Settings: Hogwart Travel's will need permission to access your device's audio in order to set alarms. 

 6. Third-Party Settings: Hogwart Travel's will need permission to access third-party services in order to provide you with travel information.
